00028 //------------------------------------------------------------
00029 // Document-entity associations
00030 //------------------------------------------------------------
00031 
00033 void
00034 ears::EntityRep::loadAssociations( const lemur::api::Index& index )
00035 {
00036   //
00037   // Parameters
00038   //
00039   std::string associationFile = lemur::api::ParamGetString( "associationFile" );
00040   int associationFileFormat = lemur::api::ParamGetInt( "associationFileFormat", 0 );
00041   std::string entityAliasMapping = lemur::api::ParamGetString( "entityAliasMapping" );
00042 
00043   if ( associationFile.length() == 0 ) {
00044     LOG( logERROR ) << "Parameter 'associationFile' is not set";
00045     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );    
00046   }
00047   
00048   if ( associationFileFormat == 2 || associationFileFormat == 3 ) {
00049     if ( entityAliasMapping.length() == 0 ) {
00050       LOG( logERROR ) << "Parameter 'entityAliasMapping' is not set";
00051       exit( EXIT_FAILURE );    
00052     }    
00053   }
00054   
00055   
00056   // +++
00057   // Loading data from file(s)
00058   // +++
00059   ifstream inFile;
00060   EXID_T entityStr;
00061   EXID_T extEntityID;
00062   EXID_T entityAlias;
00063   lemur::api::EXDOCID_T docNO;
00064   ID_T entityID;
00065   lemur::api::DOCID_T docID;
00066   double weight;
00067   int assocNum = 0;
00068   int entityNum = 0;
00069   
00070   //
00071   // Loading EntityAlias-EntityID mapping
00072   //
00073   if ( associationFileFormat % 4 >= 2 ) { // format: 2, 3, 6, 7
00074     LOG( logINFO ) << "Loading EntityAlias-EntityID mapping '" 
00075     << entityAliasMapping << "'";
00076     
00077     inFile.open( entityAliasMapping.c_str() );
00078     
00079     if ( inFile.is_open() ) {
00080       
00081       inFile >> entityAlias;
00082       while ( !inFile.eof() ) {
00083         inFile >> extEntityID;
00084         
00085         if ( entityAlias.length() > 0 && extEntityID.length() > 0 ) {
00086           aliasEntityID_[entityAlias] = extEntityID;
00087         }
00088         
00089         inFile >> entityAlias;
00090       }
00091       inFile.close();
00092       LOG( logDEBUG ) << aliasEntityID_.size() << " Alias-ID pairs loaded";
00093     }
00094     else {
00095       LOG( logERROR ) << "EntityAlias mapping file '" << entityAliasMapping 
00096       << "' does not exist";
00097       exit( EXIT_FAILURE );    
00098     }
00099   }
00100   
00101   //
00102   // Loading Document-Entity associations
00103   //
00104   LOG( logINFO ) << "Loading Entity-Document associations '" 
00105   << associationFile << "'";
00106   
00107   inFile.open( associationFile.c_str() );
00108   
00109   if ( inFile.is_open() ) {
00110     
00111     if ( associationFileFormat % 2 == 0 ) // format: 0, 2, 4, 6
00112       inFile >> docNO;
00113     else // format: 1, 3, 5, 7 
00114       inFile >> entityStr;
00115     
00116     while ( !inFile.eof() ) {
00117 
00118       if ( associationFileFormat % 2 == 0 ) // format: 0, 2, 4, 6
00119         inFile >> entityStr;
00120       else // 1, 3, 5, 7 
00121         inFile >> docNO;
00122 
00123       if ( associationFileFormat >= 4 ) // format: 4, 5, 6, 7
00124         inFile >> weight;
00125       else
00126         weight = 1.0;
00127                                 
00128       docID = index.document( docNO );
00129       if ( docID > 0 ) {
00130         if ( associationFileFormat % 4 >= 2 ) { // format: 2, 3, 6, 7
00131           extEntityID = this->entityIDfromAlias( entityStr );          
00132           LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "ENTITY ALIAS '" << entityStr << "' => ENTITY '"
00133           << extEntityID << "'";
00134         }        
00135         else { // format: 0, 1, 4, 5
00136           extEntityID = entityStr;          
00137         } 
00138         
00139         // get internal entityID
00140         entityID = this->entityID( extEntityID );
00141         // new (unseen) entityID
00142         if ( entityID < 0 ) {          
00143           entityID = entityNum;
00144           intEntityID_[extEntityID] = entityID;
00145           extEntityID_.push_back( extEntityID );
00146           entityNum++;
00147         }
00148         
00149         //
00150         // store document-entity association
00151         //
00152         bool wasAssoc = false; // docID-entityID association already existed
00153         if ( assocIndex_ == aiENTITY ) {
00154           if ( pde_.size() <= entityID )
00155             pde_.resize( entityID + 1 );
00156           if ( pde_[entityID][docID] > 0 )
00157             wasAssoc = true;
00158           pde_[entityID][docID] = weight;          
00159         }
00160         if ( assocIndex_ == aiDOCUMENT ) {
00161           if ( pde_.size() <= docID )
00162             pde_.resize( docID + 1 );
00163           if ( pde_[docID][entityID] > 0 )
00164             wasAssoc = true;
00165           pde_[docID][entityID] = weight;                    
00166         }
00167 
00168         if ( !wasAssoc ) {
00169           assocNum++;
00170           
00171           // number of documents associated with the entity
00172           if ( nd_.size() <= entityID )
00173             nd_.resize( entityID + 1, 0 );
00174           nd_[entityID]++;
00175           
00176           // number of entities associated with the document
00177           if ( ne_.size() <= docID )
00178             ne_.resize( docID + 1, 0 );
00179           ne_[docID]++;
00180         } // !wasAssoc
00181                 
00182         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "ENTITY: '" << extEntityID << "' (ID " << entityID
00183           << ")   DOC: '" << docNO << "' (ID " << docID << ")   WEIGHT: "
00184           << weight;      
00185       } // docID > 0
00186       else {
00187         LOG( logWARNING ) << "Document '" << docNO << "' does not exist in index"
00188         << " (association ignored)";
00189       }
00190       
00191       if ( associationFileFormat % 2 == 0 ) // format: 0, 2, 4, 6
00192         inFile >> docNO;
00193       else // format: 1, 3, 5, 7 
00194         inFile >> entityStr;
00195     
00196     } // !inFile.eof()
00197     inFile.close();    
00198     
00199     LOG( logDEBUG ) << entityNum << " unique entities";
00200     LOG( logDEBUG ) << assocNum << " document-entity associations";
00201   } // inFile.open()
00202   else {
00203     LOG( logERROR ) << "Association file '" << associationFile << "' does not exist";
00204     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );    
00205   }
00206   
00207 }

00210 
00212 const ears::DISTR_T& 
00213 ears::EntityRep::entityDocs( const ID_T& entityID ) const
00214 {
00215   // entity-oriented storage
00216   if ( assocIndex_ == aiENTITY ) {  
00217     if ( entityID >= 0 && entityID < pde_.size() ) 
00218       return pde_[entityID];
00219     else {
00220       LOG( logERROR ) << "Reference to non-existing entity";
00221       exit( EXIT_FAILURE );        
00222     }  
00223   }
00224 
00225   // document-oriented storage
00226   if ( assocIndex_ == aiDOCUMENT ) {
00227     LOG( logERROR ) << "This operation is not supported "
00228       << "in document-oriented storage mode";
00229     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );        
00230 
00231     /*
00232     // TODO 
00233     // associations could be returned by iterating over documents
00234     // and assessing for each whether the entity is associated with it
00235      
00236     DISTR_T pde_temp;
00237     DISTR_T::iterator pde_it;
00238      
00239     for ( ID_T docID = 0; docID < pde_.size(); docID++ ) {
00240       pde_it = pde_[docID].find( entityID );
00241       if ( pde_it != pde_[docID].end() )               
00242         pde_temp[docID] = pde_it->second;
00243     }
00244 
00245     return pde_temp;
00246     */    
00247   }
00248 }
00249 
00250 
00251 
00253 const ears::DISTR_T& 
00254 ears::EntityRep::docEntities( const ID_T& docID ) const
00255 {
00256   // document-oriented storage
00257   if ( assocIndex_ == aiDOCUMENT ) {  
00258     if ( docID > 0 && docID < pde_.size() ) 
00259       return pde_[docID];
00260     else {
00261       // document might exist but without associatons;
00262       // return docID=0, i.e., no associations
00263       return pde_[0];
00264     }  
00265   }
00266   else {
00267     LOG( logERROR ) << "This operation is not supported "
00268       << "in entity-oriented storage mode";
00269     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );        
00270 
00271     /*
00272     // TODO 
00273     // associations could be returned by iterating over entities
00274     // and assessing for each whether the document is associated with it
00275      
00276     DISTR_T pde_temp;
00277     DISTR_T::iterator pde_it;
00278      
00279     for ( ID_T entityID = 0; entityID < pde_.size(); entityID++ ) {
00280       pde_it = pde_[entityID].find( docID );
00281       if ( pde_it != pde_[entityID].end() )               
00282         pde_temp[entityID] = pde_it->second;
00283     }
00284      
00285     return pde_temp;
00286     */        
00287   }  
00288 }

00295 
00297 const int 
00298 ears::EntityRep::entityNum() const
00299 {
00300   return nd_.size();
00301 }

00304 
00306 const int 
00307 ears::EntityRep::entityDocNum( const ID_T& entityID ) const
00308 {
00309   if ( entityID >= 0 && entityID < nd_.size() ) 
00310     return nd_[entityID];
00311   else {
00312     return 0;
00313   }
00314 }

00317 
00319 const int 
00320 ears::EntityRep::docEntityNum( const lemur::api::DOCID_T& docID ) const
00321 {
00322   if ( docID >= 0 && docID < ne_.size() ) 
00323     return ne_[docID];
00324   else {
00325     return 0;
00326   }
00327 }

00330 //------------------------------------------------------------
00331 // Conversion between entity IDs
00332 //------------------------------------------------------------
00333 
00335 const ears::ID_T 
00336 ears::EntityRep::entityID( const EXID_T& extEntityID ) const
00337 {
00338   std::map< EXID_T, ID_T >::const_iterator it = intEntityID_.find( extEntityID );
00339   if ( it != intEntityID_.end() ) 
00340     return it->second;
00341   else 
00342     return -1;
00343 }
00344 
00345 
00346 
00348 const ears::EXID_T 
00349 ears::EntityRep::entityID( const ID_T& intEntityID ) const
00350 {
00351   if ( intEntityID < extEntityID_.size() ) 
00352     return extEntityID_[intEntityID];
00353   else 
00354     return UNKNOWN_ENTITY;
00355 }

00358 
00360 const ears::EXID_T  
00361 ears::EntityRep::entityIDfromAlias( const EXID_T& entityAlias ) const
00362 {
00363   std::map< EXID_T, EXID_T >::const_iterator it = aliasEntityID_.find( entityAlias );
00364   
00365   if ( it != aliasEntityID_.end() ) 
00366     return it->second;
00367   else 
00368     return UNKNOWN_ENTITY;
00369 }
